autofix.replacementText:
import {
  Component,
  CommonMethod,
  Column,
  Text,
  Color,
  BuilderParam,
  Require,
  Button,
  CustomBuilder,
} from '@kit.ArkUI';

result.rule: The ArkUI interface "Component" should be imported before it is used (arkui-modular-interface)
